CHAT.comment: Chi directs most of his own activities and works mostly on his own. Mot watches and offers suggestions from time to time. There is some talk about which objects are magnetic and Mot and Chi mention at the beginning of the activity that the Chi has a magnet set. Toward the end of the activity Chi's younger brother comes in and Chi attempts to engage him in the activity as well by showing him how to use the wand to pick up objects.. Video tape does not start until later; transcripts until then is solely from audio

u.a: explains magnet activity and tells them that she is just videotaping hands
finishes explanation
video starts here
magnets are set up on a table; Mot is seated at table; Chi is off camera; black base is full of objects
<my first magnet set> could be the name under which the magnets are sold
holds out yellow wand
reaches for yellow wand; Mot pulls it away
runs out of room
EXP and Mot talk about the Oklahoma bombing very briefly
comes back into room and reaches for yellow wand
aft unidentified person mumbles <I think that was my magnet>
aft unidentified speaker answers yeah
waves yellow wand over a magnet ball on the table so that the ball moves
ball rolls into the side of the black base
moves wand after ball toward base; a paper clip comes off the base and sticks to the yellow wand
takes paper clip off wand and puts it on table; waves wand over it
puts paper clip back on black base and moves a penny onto the table; waves wand over the penny
taps penny with wand
moves yellow wand over silver circle; silver circle sticks to the wand
asks Chi to move where she can get him on tape better
moves yellow wand over a magnet ball on the table
pulls magnet ball off yellow wand and puts it back on the table; moves wand over objects on table; a silver stick sticks to the wand
puts silver stick back on table and waves wand over it until it sticks
moves magnet ball toward one end of the horseshoe magnet which is on the table
indicates one end of the horseshoe magnet
indicates the other end of the horseshoe magnet
MOT and someone else are speaking in the background
waves yellow wand over magnet ball on table

e.ga: strange vocalizations to accompany the movement of the ball across the table

u.a: continues to use the yellow wand to make the magnet ball roll across the table
moves wand one direction over ball
moves wand a different direction over ball
moves wand another way over ball
continues to move wand in same direction rapidly
moves wand close to ball and it sticks
continues talking to the person in the background
piles all the objects on the black base
tells Chi to keep going; there is a great deal of noise in the background; the t .v . is blaring , and another person is speaking with Mot in the background
moves wand over black base; picks up black base and pulls objects off; some roll across the table
holds empty black base over objects that are scattered across the table; several nuts and washers stick to the base in a chain; Chi moves them over magnet balls and the balls stick
attempts to lift black base higher from the table and the objects that have been stuck to it in a chain fall
moves black base over a line of balls; they stick to it and a silver man sticks to the last ball
holds up black base with balls and silver man suspended from it
clears off black base
asks Chi to sit down again so she can get him on the tape
continues talking with Chi
picks up several silver men from the table
picks up another silver man
stands a silver man on his head on the silver circle on the black base
holds up the yellow wand which has a stack of nuts on it with a silver man at the top
puts a second silver man on top of the first
whispered
the silver man fell from the top of her construction
puts a third silver man on the stack of men on the black base
holds a fourth silver man over the top of his construction
mumbled
holds up black base with the stack of four men on it; the chain of balls that is on the table sticks to the bottom of it
attempts to pull balls from the bottom of the base; the silver men fall over
reaches over to pull objects from bottom of base
pulls the magnet balls and other nearby objects on table away from the black base
pulls silver men off the base and begins to restack them on it
hands Chi silver man
takes silver man from Mot and adds it to the stack
holds a fifth silver man over the four already stacked on the base
pulls silver men off base
puts one silver man back on the base
tries to put a second man on; he does not stack evenly because his feet are closer together than the hands of the man Chi is attempting to put him on
whispered
pulls the second man off
turns second man over and stacks him upside down on the first man so their hands are touching; adds a third man so his feet are stacked on the feet of the second man
stacks a fourth man with his hands on the third mans hands
attempts to stack the fifth man; he falls and knocks the other men over
begins stacking men again; gets three men in a stack
stacks a fourth man
takes the silver men off the black base
places two silver men standing on the silver circle on the black base
EXP and Mot talk about flowers and a pond behind Mot's house
softly
places a third man next to the other two on the black base
talks about Chi coming home all wound up and having trouble going to sleep
pushes plastic teddy bear across the table toward Chi
stacks a fourth man on the shoulders of two silver men who are next to one another on the black base
picks up teddy bear; shakes it; then puts it on table and slides it back toward Mot
stacks fifth silver man next to the fourth silver man on the shoulders of silver men already on the black base
gets up from chair and moves off camera
returns to table
pulls the silver men off the black base
stacks four silver men on top of one another on the base; then turns it over and tries to use the silver men to pick up other objects
picks up magnet balls in other hand and holds black base over them
clears objects off black base; puts it on the table; sticks yellow wand on top of it
there are two washers on top of the yellow wand
why the wand stuck to the base [?]
takes washers off yellow wand; lifts yellow wand and sticks it to the base again; then pulls yellow wand off , turns it over and sticks the other side of it to the black base

g.ga: Mot's former construction on yellow wand?

u.a: places nuts and washers on a stack on the yellow wand
EXP
clears objects off yellow wand; picks up black base with yellow wand and turns it over; uses the black base to pick up a chain of objects from the table
EXP
talks about nothing being worse than burying one's own child
moves yellow wand and black base with chain of magnet balls stuck to it over the pile of silver men; two of them stick to the chain of magnet balls
another child asks Mot a question
another child
the other child agrees
other child
points to plastic turtle
holds out yellow wand to Bro
pushes two silver men toward Bro
pushes two silver men in front of himself
puts a ball on the silver circle on the black base
puts another ball on the silver circle; it rolls down and sticks to the side of the black base
moves the ball back to the top of the black base
pulls a silver man from the bottom of the base and pushes it toward Mot
MOT is off camera
Chi talks about the lock being pried open , then Mot and Chi have a conversation about whether or not it had been opened and what the lock looked like
